topic.title: JSON Schema Design Mode Components and Properties

body.p: A schema diagram contains a series of interconnected components. In the JSON Schema Design mode, each component is displayed with distinguishable graphics and the thickness of the lines that connect the components identify whether the connected component is required or optional (a thick line denotes a required component while a thin line denotes an optional component).
This section provide details about the available components and their corresponding graphics, along with details about component properties.
